tika-vin02t3:2_2: Migāranattāti majjhapadalopenetaṁ vuttanti āha “migāramātuyā pana nattā hotī”ti.
tika-vin02t3:2_6: yathāsutaṁ dhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
tika-vin02t3:2_10: Atthaggahaṇe pana paññāya byāpāro adhiko paṭivijjhitabbassa atthassa atigambhīrattāti āha “paññāpubbaṅgamāya satiyā”ti.
tika-vin02t3:2_12: Yathā aññā kusītā nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnāva honti,
tika-vin02t3:2_14: evaṁ ahutvā vipphārikena cittena sabbakiccaṁ nipphādeti.
tika-vin02t3:3_0: Sabbā bhikkhuniyo satthuladdhūpasampadā saṅghato laddhūpasampadāti duvidhā.
tika-vin02t3:3_1: Garudhammapaaggahaṇena hi laddhūpasampadā mahāpajāpatigotamī satthusantikāva laddhūpasampadattā satthuladdhūpasampadā nāma.
tika-vin02t3:3_4: Tattha yā tā mahāpajāpatigotamiyā saddhiṁ nikkhantā pañcasatā sākiyāniyo,
tika-vin02t3:3_7: Ehibhikkhunībhāvena upasampannā pana bhikkhuniyo na santi tāsaṁ tathā upasampadāya abhāvato.
tika-vin02t3:3_8: Yadi evaṁ “ehi bhikkhunī”ti idha kasmā vuttanti?
tika-vin02t3:3_10: Ayañhi sotapatitatā nāma katthaci labbhamānassapi aggahaṇena hoti,
tika-vin02t3:3_11: yathā abhidhamme manodhātuniddese labbhamānampi jhānaṅgaṁ pañcaviññāṇasote patitāya na uddhaṭaṁ katthaci desanāya asambhavato,
tika-vin02t3:5_1: Parikappavacanañhetaṁ “sace bhagavā bhikkhunībhāvayogyaṁ kañci mātugāmaṁ ‘ehi bhikkhunī’ti vadeyya,
tika-vin02t3:6_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā evaṁ na kathesīti?
tika-vin02t3:6_2: Ye pana “anāsannāsannihitabhāvato”ti kāraṇaṁ vatvā “bhikkhū eva hi satthu āsannacārino sadā sannihitā ca honti,
tika-vin02t3:6_5: taṁ tesaṁ matimattaṁ satthu āsannadūrabhāvassa bhabbābhabbabhāvasiddhattā.
tika-vin02t3:7_2: bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṁ nikkhipanto,
tika-vin02t3:7_3: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo,
tika-vin02t3:7_14: so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto appaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṁvutindriyo,
tika-vin02t3:8_1: Akatādhikāratāya pana bhikkhunīnaṁ ehibhikkhunūpasampadāya ayogyatā veditabbā.
tika-vin02t3:9_0: Yadi evaṁ yaṁ taṁ therīgāthāsu bhaddāya kuṇḍalakesāya vuttaṁ –
tika-vin02t3:11_0: Ehi bhaddeti maṁ avaca, sā me āsūpasampadā”ti. ;
tika-vin02t3:15_4: Tathā hi vuttaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “ehi bhadde bhikkhunupassayaṁ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṁ santike pabbaja upasampajjassūti maṁ avaca āṇāpesi,
tika-vin02t3:15_5: sā satthu āṇā mayhaṁ upasampadāya kāraṇattā upasampadā āsi ahosī”ti.
tika-vin02t3:15_7: Tasmā bhikkhunīnaṁ ehibhikkhunūpasampadā natthiyevāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ.
tika-vin02t3:15_9: evaṁ “tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampannāti bhikkhunī”ti idampi sotapatitavaseneva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ saraṇagamanūpasampadāyapi bhikkhunīnaṁ asambhavato.
tika-vin02t3:16_1: Bhikkhuvibhaṅge “kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyeyyā”ti avatvā “samāpajjeyyā”ti vuttattā “bhikkhu āpattiyā na kāretabbo”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-vin02t3:16_4: Brāhmaṇagāmepi hi antamaso rajakādīni pañca kulāni santi.
tika-vin02t3:20_1: Dutiye “kissa pana tvaṁ ayye jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpanna”nti vacanato “uddiṭṭhā kho ayyāyo aṭṭha
tika-vin02t3:20_2: pārājikā dhammā”tiādivacanato ca bhikkhunīvibhaṅgaṁ patvā sādhāraṇāni sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṁ uppannavatthusmiṁyeva
tika-vin02t3:20_3: “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin02t3:20_5: pārājikā hoti asaṁvāsā”tiādinā nayena savisesampi avisesampi mātikaṁ ṭhapetvā anukkamena padabhājanaṁ
tika-vin02t3:20_6: āpattibhedaṁ tikacchedaṁ anāpattivārañca anavasesaṁ vatvā vitthāresi.
tika-vin02t3:20_7: Saṅgītikārakehi pana asādhāraṇapaññattiyoyeva idha vitthāritāti veditabbā.
tika-vin02t3:21_0: Atha uparimesu dvīsu apaññattesu aṭṭhannaṁ pārājikānaṁ aññataranti idaṁ vacanaṁ na yujjatīti āha “idañca pārājikaṁ pacchā paññatta”ntiādi.
tika-vin02t3:21_1: Yadi evaṁ imasmiṁ okāse kasmā ṭhapitanti āha “purimena pana saddhiṁ yugaḷattā”tiādi,
tika-vin02t3:21_2: purimena saddhiṁ ekasambandhabhāvato idha vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin02t3:21_3: “Aṭṭhannaṁ pārājikānaṁ aññatara”nti vacanato ca vajjapaṭicchādikaṁ yā paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin02t3:21_6: tathāpi sikkhāpadavītikkamacittaṁ domanassitameva hotīti katvā “dukkhavedana”nti vuttaṁ.
tika-vin02t3:26_0: Tissitthiyo methunaṁ taṁ na seveti yā tisso itthiyo vuttā,
tika-vin02t3:26_3: Tayo puriseti tayo purisepi upagantvā methunaṁ na sevati.
tika-vin02t3:26_4: Tayo ca anariyapaṇḍaketi ubhatobyañjanasaṅkhāte tayo anariye,
tika-vin02t3:26_5: tayo ca paṇḍaketi imepi cha jane upagantvā methunaṁ na sevati.
tika-vin02t3:26_6: Na cācare methunaṁ byañjanasminti anulomapārājikavasenapi attano nimitte methunaṁ nācarati.
tika-vin02t3:26_7: Chejjaṁ siyā methunadhammapaccayāti siyā methunadhammapaccayā pārājikanti ayaṁ pañho aṭṭhavatthukaṁva sandhāya vutto.
tika-vin02t3:26_8: Tassā hi methunadhammassa pubbabhāgakāyasaṁsaggaṁ āpajjituṁ vāyamantiyā methunadhammapaccayā chejjaṁ hoti.
tika-vin02t3:27_0: Methunadhammassa pubbabhāgattāti iminā methunadhammassa pubbabhāgabhūto kāyasaṁsaggoyeva tattha methunadhamma-saddena vutto,
tika-vin02t3:27_8: aṭṭhamassa vatthussa pūraṇanti imāni panettha tīṇi aṅgāni.
